item.description:
When the Quabbin Reservoir was created, four towns were flooded. As part of the relocation of the townspeople and structures, all of the gravesites were open and a total of 7561 bodies relocated to Quabbin Park Cemetery. Many of the old graves were unmarked, so approximately 500 nameless bodies were relocated with the rest. It is said that many of the spirits of old Quabbin towns are restless because their bodies were moved. Why don't we find out if there's any validity to that rumor?

Join me for an investigation of Quabbin Park Cemetery. Let's meet at the main cemetery gates on Rte 9 in Ware at 6pm for a 2-hour investigation. Then those of us who want to can go to the Debbie Wong Restaurant in Ware for dinner afterwards.

When: Sunday, Oct. 17th, 6-8pm

Where: Quabbin Park Cemetery, Route 9, Ware, MA
Check out the following link for the location of the cemetery:

http://www.epodunk.co...

What to bring: Your equipment, a flashlight, warm clothing
item.name: Quabbin Park Cemetery
